reviewText:
First, this is 40 minutes of her in everything and, yes, sometimes nothing.  So while it is unrated it is not for kids.  The DVD has a Q&A, in the form of a text, a great photo gallery with her in different outfits AND colored wigs, also a Filmography which is great because some of the trailers have been supplied for some of the movies listed.
If you are a fan this is for you.  If you are just starting to discovery of Kei Mizutani you may wish to start here after watching one of her movies.  I got Weather Woman before this DVD and now plan to get as many of her flicks as I can.

I like asain women and this woman is pretty.  The video is not from the U.S.A so it is a bit different.  It is just Kei Mizutani running around naked.  There are really no good close ups and Penthouse and some other companies have made better nude modeling videos.
Want to be challenged and take your mind off real life for a while? This isn't your film, it requires no mental capacity. However, if you enjoy the female form this film provides the visual imagery.
If you r looking for an erotic movie don't buy this one. It is only a strip show. the two stars are for the beautiful soft girl.

Kei Mizutani is simply gorgeous! The world needs more goddesses like her. If you like this, I'm sure you will dig "Wild Girls: Thailand" (ASIN: B000F6YVRW) stunning Asian girls getting naked on pristine Thai beaches .. I heard the Wild Girls crew went to Croatia after Thailand! When are they going to Japan?!?!

I just received the Kei Mizutani DVD Collection box set yesterday and UNDRESSED FOR SUCCESS was the first DVD I viewed.  Let me tell ya:  this is one HOT DVD!!!  Kei is absolutely gorgeous and possesses a truly fantastic body!  This DVD has it all - long, lingering erotic looks; hot and sexy flashes; simulated onanii complete with heavy breathing; and lots and lots of nudity!  I just can't say enough good things about this!  Yeah, it's only 40 minutes long - but it if had been any longer I think I might have caused some permanent damage!  I highly recommend this DVD for anyone who enjoys watching a beautiful and sexy woman frequently get naked!
